title: Phantasmal Force
content:
mal Force is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Illusion school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Phantasmal Force Information

Description: Deal damage to a creature each turn. The type of damage changes to the last type the creature suffered. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Illusion School Casting Time: Action Duration: 10 turns Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Intelligence

How to Acquire Phantasma
